decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - No development shall take place until samples of the materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the hereby permitted have been submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority.  Development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (PL2/PP/2456 - 01, 02, 03, 04, 05 received 29/10/2014) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 4 - The storage area/facilities hereby permitted shall be used only for storage ancillary to the dentist surgery use of the premises known as 14 St Johns Road and for not other purpose (including any purpose in Class B8 of the Schedule to the Town and Country Planning (Use Classes) Order 1987 or any order revoking or re-enacting that order).
Condition : 5 - The windows formed in the north elevation shall be obscure glazed, hinged to open inwards and shall not be repaired or replaced otherwise than with obscured glazing.

Condition : 6 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the walls of the extension hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
description: Erection of a rear extension to the ancillary building to the existing dental surgery
